question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
answer: In 2021, Bath received the designation of becoming part of the "Great Spa Towns of Europe" from UNESCO.
answer_translated_eng: In 2021, Bath received the designation of becoming part of the "Great Spa Towns of Europe" from UNESCO.
